subject: Re: Your new website design is ready : )

full_threads.body: @manuel I'm seeing the same thing.

@heath hmm its good to me...

@joel  can you please try to check at your end?

Thanks

@manuel testimonial is good - thank you. 

There is a big white space on the home page though, underneath the menu and content.

@manuel great thank you. Can you please put the testimonial part in between some commas i.e. "Testimonial here..." 

Also, please remove the 2 dummy testimonails, so there will only be 2 real ones in total. 

Also, I just noticed the main navigation bar is not sticky, can you please activate that... it's a setting on the header Elementor template for that particular row in Elementor.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Manuel Lito Manceli

full_threads.body:
Hello Heath,

Here's another testimonial that can be uploaded to the website.

"Our office had gone through a refresh to accommodate our growing staff and operation. We later realised that we had left out the washrooms and while the office space was modernised, the washrooms were stuck in their original 1970 style of terrazzo and wooden doors! We reached out to API Commercial and they provided a turn key solution to our problem. They completed during normal business operations with minor disruption to our operations, the finished result has boosted staff morale and greatly improved the functionality of our washrooms. A brilliant result. "

Contact: Andrew Gillies
Number: 0429 034 395


Regards,

Ingrid Hobson

Sales Consultant

<http://www.apicommercial.com.au/>

Freecall: 1800 630 535 <tel:1800630535> D: 02 4708 9411 <tel:0247821615> E: ingrid@apicommercial.com.au <mailto:ingrid@apicommercial.com.au>
A: 9 Pullman Place, Emu Plains NSW 2750 Post: PO Box 7079, Leura 2780


<http://www.apicommercial.com.au/>

A division of the Almar Group

Licence No. 216380C

Click here <http://www.apicommercial.com.au/education-recreational-publicamenities.html> to check out our latest projects!

We are getting close!

Thanks and speak soon,

HEATH MAGUIRE

>>> Hi Ingrid,
>>>
>>> Ok perfect, I have the MailChimp logins and have integrated with the new site : )
>>>
>>> We have been making great strides, and it’s looking really good. I just need a couple more things from you please:
>>>
>>> Project Categories - Please have a look at the attached excel file. Can you please put a ‘1’ to indicate which categories the projects should show up in. They can be assigned to multiple categories as well. I have taken a quick pass at it, but lack the knowledge that you guys have. If you can complete and send it back, that would be amazing.
>>> Individual Industry Pages - there are a couple of sentences up the top, under the title on each of these pages. You will notice they are all the same currently. Can you please send through the revised content for these?
>>> https://apicommercial.wpperk.cloud/education/ <https://apicommercial.wpperk.cloud/education/>
>>> https://apicommercial.wpperk.cloud/retail/ <https://apicommercial.wpperk.cloud/retail/>

>>> https://apicommercial.wpperk.cloud/public/ <https://apicommercial.wpperk.cloud/public/>
>>> Blog article - you will see I have put in a dummy one on the news page. Please send one through once it’s ready.
>>>
>>> Please also have a good look through the site and let me know of any tweaks of if you have any questions?
>>>
>>> Thanks and speak soon,
>>>

>>> CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU <https://wolfiq.com.au/>
>>> E. heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au> | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271
